title: Cant connect to chat, and where is the chest page?
body: EUNE whats going on? There is no bar for chests between "profile" and "store" and im constantly dc'ed from chat

replies.body: There appears to be a server issue currently that's causing some problems with chat and loading hextech.  Ranked and hextech crafting have been disabled until the issue is resolved.  Updates will continue to be provided on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#euw) page.  Hang tight!
same here hope riot will fix this till tommorow
